description.body: It’s our last balance patch of the year! Cozy up and read all about the upcoming rework to Zyra and other balance changes.
Forecast for today and all days to come: Acid rain. Kog'Maw, the Mouth of the Abyss, waddles on to the Rift on Dec 11th UTC ☔☣️
This patch we have a couple of balance changes across the map and the release of Kog’Maw, welcome to Patch 6.3e!

title: Everything you need to know about Supervillain Jinx

description.body: Learn about the new skin tier and our super villainous first entry.

title: Wild Rift Minimum Device Specification Requirements Update

description.body: Welcome to Patch 6.3d, we’re bumping some True Damage tunes, sharpening Yuumi’s claws, and balancing some champions across the board.
Things were looking a little dull on the Rift so we’re bringing the heavy metal with Rell, the Iron Maiden, on Nov 14th UTC!
Some champions are finding their groove, others are getting a reality check, welcome to Patch 6.3c!
Welcome to Patch 6.3b! We hope you’re enjoying AAA ARAM and testing out our pro player Augment cards! We have a few updates for them and Arena.
We have a quick addition to the Patch Notes that was just released, welcome 6.3a!
It’s our 5th birthday and we’re ready to celebrate with you all! Welcome to Patch 6.3, Gilded Glory.
Spearheading a new era of feline supremacy. Nidalee, the Bestial Huntress, prowls on to the Rift on Oct 23rd UTC!
It's the last patch of 6.2 and we have a few quick adjustments for AAA ARAM.

Join Ke, John, and some special friends for the biggest party of the year! We’re turning 5 and celebrating with WORLDS, Wild Rounds: SMASH, and MUCH MORE. Admire your Gilded Glory with patch 6.3 on October 23rd UTC.
Our Patch Preview just launched, get a deep dive on all the major gameplay updates coming in Patch 6.3.
Welcome to patch 6.2k! We’ve been keeping an eye on how the meta has been shaping up and we have a few adjustments to some outlier champions who have been dominating the Rift.
Welcome to the “j” version of 6.2. We wanted to make sure we fit the j theme of this patch so we’re launching 20 new Augments for AAA ARAM including our J series, Sync-Up, and Champions.
We’re making a few adjustments to augments, welcome to patch 6.2i!
Caw caw! Swain’s rework is making its arrival, along with some balance updates.
Do you believe in death at first sight? Your foes will when they look deep into #Vel’Koz’ eye on September 12th UTC!
We hope you’ve studied up on your geometry, because Vel’Koz is making his debut and we have some updates to AAA ARAM.
We’re nearing the end of our 6.2 patch cycle and after keeping a close eye on the jungle, there are a few adjustments we’re making.
This patch we’re striking a balance between revving up some of our underperformers and cooling off the overachievers. Welcome to Patch 6.2e!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2d - Adventure Modes

description.body: We’re launching some new Augments and making a few adjustments for AAA ARAM.
Who else comes with their own music and mini-game? Collect meeps with #Bard and take your team on magical journeys on Aug 22nd UTC!

This patch we’re zeroing in on sharpening some champion identities and adjusting their power curves across all stages of the game. As well as nerfing some champions who have been dominating the game. Welcome to Patch 6.2c!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2c - Adventure Mode Hotfix

description.body: AAA ARAM has been out for a few days and we have a couple of adjustments to the mode!

title: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.2b - Main & Adventure Modes

description.body: We’re grooooovin’ right on into Patch 6.2b. We’ve made a handful of balance changes, the return of AAA ARAM, Arena, ARURF as well as the launch of Space Groove Lux!
A new Battlefest Season, Arena is back, and our animalistic AAA ARAM update is here!
We’re hot off the tails of our big 6.2 update! We made a lot of changes, so we’re following up with some needed balance changes.
Want to go on an Adventure with Aurora and earn a free Star Guardian Jinx Exquisite Edition? Learn more in this week’s Rift Report!
Aurora makes her arrival, marksmen get some sharp updates, our Player Behavior System is here, and soooo much more! Welcome to Patch 6.2
She might have her BOUNDaries but that doesn’t stop #Aurora from exploring new realms. Hop on July 17th UTC!

It’s time to lock in! Patch 6.2 is right around the corner and we have lots of updates in store. Learn more about some of the new champions, items, Rift updates and more before the new patch launches.
In Patch 6.1 we’ll be launching our much awaited Player Behavior System. Read to learn more about how it will work.

title: Everything you need to know about Soulforce Awakening

description.body: Breathe in…breathe out. It’s time to dig deep within and find your inner strength. Learn more about the new patch theme, Soulforce Awakening coming to Wild Rift in Patch 6.2!
Grab your star maps, and let’s dive into the last sparkly bits of Patch 6.1f!
Welcome to Patch 6.1e, we’re updating some of our Adventure Modes.
Patch 6.2 is right around the corner, we’re recapping all the big beats so you’re ready before the patch drops.
Learn more about Zilean’s new ability from our dev team, and see who our creator of the week is!
Tick, tick, boom! Zilean makes his debut this patch, along with a new Wild Pass, Companion, and Balance Patch. Welcome to Patch 6.1d.
We’re taking a look at our Anti-Cheat and sharing some stats since we made our updates at the start of Patch 6.1 and spotlighting our community!
Running out of time? No worries, starting June 13th UTC #Zilean can turn it back for you no problem!
Welcome to our first edition of Rift Report, where we’ll be sharing any in-game updates and highlighting you, our community!
With the recent launch of Adventure’s Star, we’re making a few adjustments to AAA ARAM & Arena.
Garen rework, Black Market Mayhem, and balance changes— welcome to Patch 6.1b.

title: AAA ARAM Launch & Adventure Mode Updates

description.body: Adventure’s Star has gathered enough cosmic energy and is about to go live! Learn about all the updates to our Adventure Modes coming on May 16!
Get ready to haunt your enemies in and out of the Rift. Embody everybody’s nightmare with #Nocturne arriving on May 16th UTC!
Are you afraid of the dark? Nocturne makes their debut, balance updates, and Adventure’s Star has gathered enough cosmic energy! Welcome to Patch 6.1a!
David Xu, Wild Rift’s Executive Producer sits down to take a look back at Patch 6.0 and some of the learnings the team had.
Gaze up at the stars and enjoy all the goodies and fun that Patch 6.1 has to offer!
Patch 6.1 is about to drop, so we’re recapping some of the big beats before the patch launch!
Enemy midlaner annoying you? Send them to Rune Prison with #Ryze on April 17th UTC!
Sparkly stars aren’t the only thing we’re adding to the Rift! Learn more about some of the new items and other updates we’re bringing to the Rift in Patch 6.1!
It’s the last patch of 6.0, and we’re spilling the tea on the latest balance changes before we head into Patch 6.1!
Feeling a bit lost and uninspired? Fear not! #Poppy arrives on March 28th UTC with enough purpose for everybody!
Grab your purplest pj’s, your hammer, and swing into patch 6.0d with the arrivals of Pajama Guardian Lulu and Poppy!
Polish up those goggles and strap in, because new and improved #Corki takes off on March 6th UTC!
We’ve got a bogey on our tail! Corki’s rework, the launch of Gnar, balance changes, and more. Welcome to Patch 6.0c!
You better all be ready for playtime on February 21st UTC, because #Gnar won’t shy away from showing his true feelings!
We’ve got new threads for the new year! Start weaving them on January 27th!
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0b
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0a
Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0
You better oil all those hinges and fix those screws, because once #Rumble hits on January 9th UTC there’ll be no stopping him!
A few balance changes for the last patch of 2024
New patch, new you? How about a new way of life?! David, John, and Ke show you the journey to YORDLE UP your life with patch 6.0! Coming to you on January 9th UTC. #LETSYORDLE
The progress of the arcane is inevitable. Become part of it on December 12th UTC!
Experience a reworked Singed and the new Showdown mode in Wild Rift Patch 5.3c.
How we’re celebrating Arcane Season 2 in Wild Rift.
Uncage the true wrath of Zaun with Warwick's new rework! Hitting the Rift on November 21st UTC!
How are we feeling after the Arcane Season 2 premiere? But there is no time to rest because we have a brand new game mode for you!
The age of Merdada is upon us. Bow to the warlord or get swept under her power on November 7th UTC!
Look out! A Warlord behind you!
